name: Cromadic
description:
Cromadic is a 3D Puzzle Platformer starring our crowtagonist. Use the elements to traverse the cave and take in the environment as you please.

Created by Team nullptr of UCI's 2018-2019 year.

Producer - Xiyu Wang, Kenneth Yam

Programmer - Kevin Chase, Gregg Sueda, Yian Li, Xiyu Wang, Kenneth Yam

Art - Kevin Chase

Designer - Gregg Sueda, Xiyu Wang, Kenneth Yam

Sound Design - Xiyu Wang
